content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, the feast you hosted... {A惊叹}<style=SizeBig>was very well received!</style>

content: Even those who don't usually cook were inspired to give it another go when they got home... Hoho! The results matter little. What matters the most is having the courage to try things.

content: {A期待}Everyone's excited to see you put on an even bigger one next time!
